_workflow_explanation.description: Create a bond from specified interfaces or auto-discover by VLAN
_workflow_explanation.step_1: create_bond: Creates a bond interface from physical interfaces
_workflow_explanation.note: Supports two modes: 1) Explicit interface names, 2) Auto-discover by VLAN ID
_workflow_explanation.mode_2_auto: Provide 'vlan_id' to automatically find interfaces with that VLAN
_workflow_explanation.subnet_auto_config: When vlan_id is used, automatically links bond to subnet for that VLAN

bonds.name: Bond interface name (e.g., 'bond0', 'bond1')
bonds.interfaces: List of interface names to bond (explicit mode) OR
bonds.vlan_id: VLAN ID to auto-discover interfaces (auto mode)
